name: fish freezing, small fish | fish freezing, small fish | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18411/documentation

The activity represents the freezing os small fish in a freezing plant. The functional unit is 1000 kg of raw material processed, excluding residues. The total raw material demand of this activity is 1000 kg of preprocessed raw material + the amount of residues generated by preprocessing (gutting, heading, tailing, peeling, filleting, etc). The life cycle inventories were produced based on a sample of 1 Peruvian plant (processing capacity: 16 200 t/y) and data from other industry representatives. The data applies to small fish such as small pelagics (anchovies, herrings, sardines, mackerels) and small bottom feeders (grouppers, eals, small cods, haddock, bass, snappers). Energy demands for processing large fish may be different. This activity can be used to model fish processing in other geographies.;Users must use this service activity in combination with an activity providing the raw material (fish).;System boundaries of fish processing for Direct Human Consumption (DHC) and relations between activities;Detailed system boundaries of DCH activities in Peru, including provision of fish from dedicated fleet

From delivery of consumables to the plant, through its Use phase (production), including all upstream activities (e.g. provision of infrastructure, fuels, electricity, chemicals and packaging materials).

Excludes fishery activities and provision of raw material (fish)
category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/102:Processing and preserving of fish, crustaceans and molluscs/1020:Processing and preserving of fish, crustaceans and molluscs

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Production figures represent the period 2012. Valid as of 2017.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Small pelagics freezing activities of Peruvian fish freezing plants, per t of processing capacity. Plants have a lifespan of 30 years;Process diagram of small fish freezing
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data from small pelagics freezing were assumed to represent the freezing of other fish. For large, whole fish, energy expenditure adjustments should be made.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Data from 1 freezing plant. This plant is representative of the current technology and management, as determined by interviews with many technical, commercial, academic and governmental representatives.
As of 2017 there were 127 active fish freezing plants in Peru, with an aggregated processing capacity of 3.3 million t/y.

exchanges.description: Amount of raw material processed, excluding residues. The total raw material demand of this activity is 1000 kg of preprocessed raw material + the amount of residues generated by preprocessing (gutting, heading, tailing, peeling, filleting, etc).
